roleset.name: take again, take back
roleset.note: RETAKE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'retake' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. Comparison to 'take'. (from retake.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: the one example
example.text: ``We are retaking the instruments of administration,'' says Raul Robles, a Pemex subdirector.
